step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Ensure your elbows stay close to your body as you begin to raise them.
You're doing well bringing your hands behind your head. Try to spread your elbows wider to increase the chest stretch.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide. This is the key part for stretching your chest and shoulders.
Holding the stretch is important. Focus on maintaining the wide elbow position and relaxed shoulders.
Nicely done reversing the motion. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling your hands forward.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Keep focusing on keeping your elbows close when raising your hands and spreading them wide behind your head to get the best stretch.
